name: Ramen Rave
description:
It's Jammy's birthday and I want to give him a present. Maybe I can cook him something. Like ramen?

Controls:

     A/D or arrow keys to move

     Space to jump

     S to jump down platforms

     Left mouse button to aim and throw 

          utensils

Assets used:

MusicJoshua McLean - 50s Bit, Mountain Trials, CelebrateFontsDaniel Linssen - m6x11
